## GroupManager.cascadeCollapse() method

Cascade a collapse from the given `collapsedGroup` into the given `targetGroup`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cascadeCollapse(collapsedGroup: UIGroup<E>, targetGroup: UIGroup<E>, collapsedIds: Set<string>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collapsedGroup | [UIGroup](./core.uigroup)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt; |  |
|  targetGroup | [UIGroup](./core.uigroup)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt; |  |
|  collapsedIds | Set&lt;string&gt; | Set of connection ids for already collapsed connections, which we can ignore. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
